title: pudu vAzhkkai
sahitya:
pudu vAzhkkai tara vENDum pUraNa guruvE nalla


anupallavi

  madhu malar vana vaNDenavE magizhcci koNDa toNDaruDanE


caraNam    tAzhvu tIra bhArata shakti tazhaikka vENDinEn saNDai pEigaL
sAya shAntam shezhikka vENDinEn vAzhvuk-kalaiyE yOgamAga
vaLara vENDinEn vAn amudam mAnilattil vazhiya vENDinEn
